it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.view

Interface ConnectionView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLIConnectionView, GUIConnectionView

    public interface ConnectionView
    A client-only view used to ask the user for a server address.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ConnectionView.ConnectionType 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectionView.ConnectionType getConnectionType() 
      java.lang.String getServerHost() 
      int getServerPort() 
      void prompt()
      This method will block the calling thread until the user has entered the required connection data.
      void reportError(java.lang.String message)
      Reports to the view that the entered data could not establish a valid connection.
      void reportSuccess()
      Reports to the view that the entered data has successfully established a connection to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • prompt

        void prompt()
        This method will block the calling thread until the user has entered the required connection data. Getters in this class will return the data entered by the user once this method has returned.

      • getServerHost

        java.lang.String getServerHost()

      • getServerPort

        int getServerPort()

      • getConnectionType

        ConnectionView.ConnectionType getConnectionType()

      • reportError

        void reportError(java.lang.String message)
        Reports to the view that the entered data could not establish a valid connection.
        Parameters:
        message - A user readable message explaining the error.

      • reportSuccess

        void reportSuccess()
        Reports to the view that the entered data has successfully established a connection to the server.
